ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How many meetings of Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA), or another 12-step program for substance abuse recovery would you estimate that you have gone to in your lifetime?
How many meetings of Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA), or another 12-step program have you gone to in the last 12 months?
Since the last time we interviewed you, how many meetings of Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA), or another 12-step program have you attended?
Have you ever considered yourself a member of Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA) or another 12-step program?
Have you ever called a member of Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA), or another 12-step program for help?
Do you now have a sponsor for Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA), or another 12-step program?
Have you ever sponsored anyone in Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA), or another 12-step?
Have you had a spiritual awakening or a conversion experience through your involvement with Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA), or another 12-step program?
In the past 12 months, have you read literature from Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA), or another 12-step program?

In the past 12 months, have you done service, helped newcomers, set up chairs, made coffee, cleaned up after a meeting, or otherwise assisted with Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), Narcotics Anonymous (NA) or another 12-step program?
How often do you currently attend Alcoholics Anonymous, Narcotics Anonymous, or other 12-Step meetings?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Less than once a month; 2= Once a month; 3= More than once per week; 4= Several times per week

ElementDescription: It is very important for me to attend 12-step meetings for my recovery.
Notes: 0= Strongly disagree; 1= Disagree; 2= Neither agree nor disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am going to attend 12-step meetings.
Notes: 0= Strongly disagree; 1= Disagree; 2= Neither agree nor disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree
0= Strongly disagree; 1= Disagree; 2= Neither agree nor disagree; 3= Agree; 4= Strongly agree
